text.autoconfig.vanadium.title: Vanadium Configuration
text.autoconfig.vanadium.subtitle: Vanadium Options
text.autoconfig.vanadium.option.clearSky: Use the sky color for fog.
text.autoconfig.vanadium.option.clearVoi: Don't render the void, even when below sea level.
text.autoconfig.vanadium.option.blendSky: Blend sky light smoothly during sunrise and sunset.
text.autoconfig.vanadium.option.relative: The intensity of block light relative to sky light. Lower values make block light dimmer in ambient light.
text.autoconfig.vanadium.biomeBlendRadiu: Controls the blend radius used by Vanadium
